contents.title: 1. Overview of Services
contents.description: Our platform offers a variety of tools and services to facilitate decentralized clinical trials (DCTs) with seamless mobile integration, ensuring an efficient and user-friendly experience.

subs.subTitle: ePRO (Electronic Patient Reported Outcomes)
subs.description: ePRO enables patients to report their health data electronically through their devices, streamlining data collection for clinical studies.
exList: Download the mobile app.
Log in with your credentials.
Begin entering your health data as prompted.

subs.subTitle: eCOA (Electronic Clinical Outcome Assessments)
subs.description: eCOA simplifies the process for capturing clinical outcomes through patient, clinician, and caregiver reports.
exList: Navigate to the eCOA section on your dashboard.
Select the form assigned to your study.
Fill out the required information and submit.

subs.subTitle: eCRF (Electronic Case Report Forms)
subs.description: eCRF allows researchers to collect and manage clinical trial data through secure, electronic forms.
exList: Log in to your researcher account.
Select the trial you are managing.
Add or update patient case data via the eCRF form.

subs.subTitle: CDMS (Clinical Data Management System)
subs.description: The CDMS ensures all data collected from trials is securely stored and efficiently managed, with real-time access to all authorized users.
exList: Go to the CDMS tab from the main navigation.
View all ongoing trials and access data analytics.

subs.subTitle: Smart Notifications
subs.description: Receive real-time notifications about upcoming survey times, participation encouragement, and clinical trial updates on your mobile phone to keep your participation level in check.
exList: Go to your account settings on the mobile app.
Toggle the “Enable Smart Notifications” option.

subs.subTitle: Remote Care
subs.description: Participate in clinical trials without needing to visit the clinic. Communicate with healthcare providers, send reports, and monitor progress remotely.
exList: Log in to the mobile app.
Go to the “Remote Care” section to schedule a virtual appointment or submit reports.

subs.subTitle: eConsent Forms
subs.description: Our eConsent tool provides a secure and efficient way to gather informed consent electronically.
exList: Navigate to the eConsent section in the app or on the web.
Review the consent document and sign electronically.

subs.subTitle: Survey Generation Tools
subs.description: Design and distribute surveys to gather important patient feedback during the trial.
exList: Go to the “Survey Tools” on your dashboard.
Select “Create New Survey” and customize your questions.
Send the survey directly to participants via mobile or web.

helpList.helpTitle: How do I reset my password?

exList: Click on “Reset Password” in the settings at the top of the page, enter your registered email, and follow the instructions in the email you receive.

helpList.helpTitle: Can I access the platform from multiple browsers?

exList: You can access multiple pages within the same browser on the same device.
However, it’s not possible to log into multiple accounts simultaneously on the same device.
You cannot access multiple accounts in the same browser; you need to use a separate browser profile for each account.

helpList.helpTitle: How do I get technical support?

exList: If you encounter any issues, please contact our support team at evix-dct@evidnet.co.kr
